en: One of Dominique's criticisms concerns the graphic designs - they're terrible! While he respects that you did the work on your own, he requests you find a reputable graphic designer to update things for you.

You find two candidates you like, but there's a major difference between them - the price. One is an up-and-comer with little experience and a $300 price tag, while the other is reputable, good at meeting deadlines, and priced to match at $1000. Which do you choose?
You choose the reliable, experienced graphic designer. New talent is great, but now might not be the time to go with someone without a proven track record.
No need to spend more than you have to - and you're giving a fresh face spotlight! You feel great about your decision.
